pkgmetadata.longdescription: Misclassified Interval Censored Time-to-Event Data // Estimation of the survivor function for interval censored time-to-event data subject to misclassification using nonparametric maximum likelihood estimation, implementing the methods of Titman (2017) doi:10.1007/s11222-016-9705-7. Misclassification probabilities can either be specified as fixed or estimated. Models with time dependent misclassification may also be fitted.
